site.query: select ID, ObjectID, Name, Description, ParentSiteObjectID from Site

counter.query: SELECT [DeviceID] ,[EventSourceConnectionID] ,[CounterName] ,[COUNTER].[CounterResourceName] ,[Timestamp] ,[Value] ,[InstanceName] FROM [dbo].[PerformanceAnalysisData] AS DATA JOIN [PerformanceAnalysisCounter] AS [COUNTER] ON [COUNTER].[ID] = [DATA].[PerformanceAnalysisCounterID] JOIN [PerformanceAnalysisCounterName] AS [NAME] on [COUNTER].[CounterResourceName] = [NAME].[CounterResourceName] WHERE [Timestamp] = (SELECT MAX([Timestamp]) FROM PerformanceAnalysisData) AND ( [COUNTER].[CounterResourceName] = 'BATCH_REQUESTS_PER_SEC' OR [COUNTER].[CounterResourceName] = 'PAGE_LIFE_EXPECTANCY' OR ( [COUNTER].[CounterResourceName] = 'PERCENT_PROCESSOR_TIME' AND [InstanceName] = '_Total' ) OR [COUNTER].[CounterResourceName] = 'PROCESSES_BLOCKED' OR [COUNTER].[CounterResourceName] = 'PROCESSOR_QUEUE_LENGTH' OR [COUNTER].[CounterResourceName] = 'IO_READ_BYTES_PER_SEC' OR [COUNTER].[CounterResourceName] = 'IO_WRITE_BYTES_PER_SEC' OR [COUNTER].[CounterResourceName] = 'PAGE_FAULTS_PER_SEC' OR [COUNTER].[CounterResourceName] = 'SQL_COMPILATIONS_PER_SEC' OR [COUNTER].[CounterResourceName] = 'SQL_RE-COMPILATIONS_PER_SEC' OR [COUNTER].[CounterResourceName] = 'USER_CONNECTIONS' )
